## Description {#details}

Represents a temporary file.

The temporary file must be eventually discarded or given a final name and kept.

The destructor doesn&#39;t implicitly discard because there is no way to properly handle errors in a destructor.

Definition at line 843 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h">FileSystem.h</a>.
